verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> as touching <S%G4012><s%> things offered unto idols, <S%G1494><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we all <S%G3956><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> knowledge. <S%G1108><s%> Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> puffeth up, <S%G5448><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> charity <S%G26><s%> edifieth. <S%G3618><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> that he knoweth <S%G1492><s%> any thing, <S%G5100><s%> he knoweth <S%G1097><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> yet <S%G3764><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he ought <S%G1163><s%> to know. <S%G1097><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> love <S%G25><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> is known <S%G1097><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

As concerning <S%G4012><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> eating <S%G1035><s%> of those things that are offered in sacrifice unto idols, <S%G1494><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> an idol <S%G1497><s%> is nothing <S%G3762><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> there is none <S%G3762><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> one. <S%G1520><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> though <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1512><s%> there be <S%G1526><s%> that are called <S%G3004><s%> gods, <S%G2316><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> (as <S%G5618><s%> there be <S%G1526><s%> gods <S%G2316><s%> many, <S%G4183><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lords <S%G2962><s%> many,) <S%G4183><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> there is but one <S%G1520><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Howbeit <S%G235><s%> there is not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every man <S%G3956><s%> that knowledge: <S%G1108><s%> for <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> with conscience <S%G4893><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> idol <S%G1497><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> this hour <S%G737><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> it as <S%G5613><s%> a thing offered unto an idol; <S%G1494><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G848><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> weak <S%G772><s%> is defiled. <S%G3435><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> meat <S%G1033><s%> commendeth <S%G3936><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to God: <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> neither, <S%G3777><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we eat, <S%G5315><s%> are we the better; <S%G4052><s%> neither, <S%G3777><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we eat <S%G5315><s%> not, <S%G3361><s%> are we the worse. <S%G5302><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> take heed <S%G991><s%> lest by any means <S%G3381><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> liberty <S%G1849><s%> of yours <S%G5216><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> a stumblingblock <S%G4348><s%> to them that are weak. <S%G770><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> which hast <S%G2192><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%> sit at meat <S%G2621><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the idol's temple, <S%G1493><s%> shall not <S%G3780><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> which is <S%G5607><s%> weak <S%G772><s%> be emboldened <S%G3618><s%> to eat <S%G2068><s%> those things which are offered to idols; <S%G1494><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> through <S%G1909><s%> thy <S%G4674><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%> shall the <S%G3588><s%> weak <S%G770><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> perish, <S%G622><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died? <S%G599><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when ye sin <S%G264><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wound <S%G5180><s%> their <S%G848><s%> weak <S%G770><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> ye sin <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Wherefore, <S%G1355><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> meat <S%G1033><s%> make my brother to offend, <S%G4624><s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G80><s%> I will eat <S%G5315><s%> no <S%G3364><s%> flesh <S%G2907><s%> while the world standeth, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> I make my brother to offend. <S%G4624><s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G80><s%>
